00045 CCedrusXidResponseDevice::CCedrusXidResponseDevice()
00046     : xid_device_(),
00047       button_count_(0)
00048 {
00049 }
00050 
00051 void CCedrusXidResponseDevice::set_button_names()
00052 {
00053     button_names_.clear();
00054 
00055     if(!xid_device_)
00056     {
00057         return;
00058     }
00059 
00060     std::wstring prefix = xid_device_->input_name_prefix();
00061 
00062     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < button_count_; ++i)
00063     {
00064         if(button_count_ == 1)
00065         {
00066             button_names_.push_back(prefix);
00067         }
00068         else
00069         {
00070             button_names_.push_back(
00071                 prefix + L" " + to_wstr(i+1));
00072         }
00073     }
00074 }
00075 
00076 void CCedrusXidResponseDevice::set_xid_device(
00077     boost::shared_ptr<cedrus::xid_device_t> xid_device)
00078 {
00079     xid_device_ = xid_device;
00080     button_count_ = xid_device_->get_button_count();
00081     set_button_names();
00082 }
00083 
00084 STDMETHODIMP CCedrusXidResponseDevice::getName(BSTR *name)
00085 {
00086     if(!xid_device_)
00087     {
00088         last_error_ = L"Xid device has not been properly initialized.";
00089         return E_FAIL;
00090     }
00091 
00092     std::string dev_name = xid_device_->get_device_name();
00093     std::wstring wname;
00094     wname.assign(dev_name.begin(), dev_name.end());
00095 
00096     *name = SysAllocString(wname.c_str());
00097     return S_OK;
00098 }

00117 STDMETHODIMP CCedrusXidResponseDevice::getProperties(BSTR *parameters)
00118 {
00119     *parameters = SysAllocString(to_wstr(button_count_).c_str());
00120     return S_OK;
00121 }

00129 STDMETHODIMP CCedrusXidResponseDevice::getButtonCount(unsigned long *count)
00130 {
00131     *count = button_count_;
00132     return S_OK;
00133 }
00134 
00135 STDMETHODIMP CCedrusXidResponseDevice::getButtonNames(BSTR *names, unsigned long *count)
00136 {
00137 #undef min
00138     *count = std::min<unsigned long>(*count, button_count_);
00139 
00140     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < *count; ++i)
00141     {
00142         names[i] = SysAllocString(button_names_[i].c_str());
00143     }
00144     return S_OK;
00145 }
00146 
00147 STDMETHODIMP CCedrusXidResponseDevice::acquire(
00148     unsigned char useButtons,
00149     unsigned char useAxes,
00150     IActiveResponseDevice **device)
00151 {
00152     HRESULT rval = S_OK;
00153 
00154     try
00155     {
00156         COM_ptr<IActiveResponseDevice> active_device;
00157         active_device = active_device.create(
00158             CLSID_CedrusXidActiveDevice, IID_IActiveResponseDevice);
00159 
00160 
00161         if(active_device.get() == 0)
00162         {
00163             last_error_ = L"Failed to create response device";
00164             rval = E_FAIL;
00165         }
00166         else
00167         {
00168             *device = active_device.get();
00169             (*device)->AddRef();
00170 
00171             CCedrusXidActiveDevice *dev = static_cast<
00172                 CCedrusXidActiveDevice*>(*device);
00173 
00174             dev->set_xid_device(xid_device_);
00175             dev->setButtonCount(button_count_);
00176         }
00177     }
00178     catch(...)
00179     {
00180         last_error_ = L"Failed to create response device";
00181         rval = E_FAIL;
00182     }
00183 
00184     return rval;
00185 }

00194 STDMETHODIMP CCedrusXidResponseDevice::getAxisNames(BSTR *names, unsigned long *count)

00196     *count = 0;
00197     names = NULL;
00198     return S_OK;
00199 }

00201 STDMETHODIMP CCedrusXidResponseDevice::getLastError(BSTR *error)
